description: Data availability means having an environment where people have appropriate access to data, data is available for re-use (where appropriate), and there is efficient and safe flow of data between individuals and organisations.

definition.definitionText1: Data availability means having an environment where people have appropriate access to data, data is available for re-use (where appropriate), and there is efficient and safe flow of data between individuals and organisations.

purpose.purposeText1: Itâ€™s crucial for meeting the objectives set out in the Digital Health and Disability Strategy.

synonyms: Data sharing, data discoverability, data access, data availability, data portability, data mobility
